summary: Version 1.1.1 adds a self-service domain checker, lets you change your username, and introduces OnboardingAgent for automated email sequences. It also brings user-level rate limiting to RSS feeds, makes Blazes a permanent feature, and includes the usual round of fixes for Stripe, database migrations, and the build process.

features: auto-release gw/gf on code changes, add Lattice GitHub Releases
add make release target for automated tagging
rewrite install.sh with GitHub Releases fallback
add tag-triggered release workflow, simplify CI to test-only
add version injection to gf, scope gw tag pattern
promote wisp_enabled to a proper graft
add D1 migration tracking and gw d1 migrate-all
add UA-based rate limiting to RSS feed endpoint (#1291)
fixes: rewrite summary prompt to sound like a person, not a pitch deck
reorder 086 DDL, isolate wisp to tenant_settings
give review bot file access and verify-before-report prompt
address review — dead code, signpost errors, header trim
fix Stripe webhook failures — signature rotation, config gating, sanitizer
early safety gate on tenant delete, better wrangler errors
remove broken dark:text-cream-* overrides on roadmap phase text
remove stale svelte-ignore comments breaking CI
use build tags for Windows-compatible process management
